boardgame.name: Cosmic Encounter
boardgame.description: Players represent alien races that are seeking to spread themselves onto five foreign worlds. To accomplish this, they make challenges against other players and enlist the aid of interested parties. But alien powers, which are unique to each race, give players ways to bend or outright break some rule in the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is an updated version of the original Eon Cosmic Encounter (1977)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Major differences between this version and the Eon version:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Flares in the Mayfair version are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;use once and discard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, as opposed to Eon's version, which lets players reuse them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Moons (in the More Cosmic Encounter expansion) have text written on them (instead of only a number which you used to refer to a separate list). Moons also were divided into four categories: Full Moons have a major effect on the game; Half Moons are more moderate in their effects; Quarter Moons have a minor effect; Cheese Moons introduce silliness to the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Lucre (in the More Cosmic Encounter expansion) was revamped with additional uses, and players were required to spend it to affect their challenge totals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mayfair introduced a new card: Reinforcements, as well as new Edicts, and several new Alien Powers with corresponding Flares._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mayfair introduced phase / timing icons on all Powers, Flares, and Edicts to clearly indicate when each could be used._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; More Cosmic Encounter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Eon's Cosmic Encounter (1977)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Simply Cosmic, Mayfair's simplified version_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: The original Mayfair Cosmic Encounter game plus More Cosmic Encounter together. They have been mingled over the years and are inseparable. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s some wear on the boxes, but components are in great shape and 100% complete. These are heavy games, so postage will be somewhat expensive.

You get Cosmic Encounters, More Cosmic, and Simply Cosmic. Everything is in the box of Cosmic Encounters. There is no box for More Cosmic and Simply Cosmic. Condition: Complete game (no missing pieces). Played many times. All components in good condition. Rules have handwritten clarifications on them. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: Please, send me an e-mail and I will let you know about the cost. Payment: PayPal ONLY.

Cosmic Encounter Good condition and 100% complete. Mayfair Games edition. ALSO included is the More Cosmic Encounter expansion! The expansion is complete and included in the box with the base game. I welcome international buyers!
Auction item reserved for davidchujr.
for sale to aaron potter
This item also includes More Cosmic Encounter and is reserved for auction winner kdean1.

This is a copy of the Mayfair edition in great shape, comes with 48 alien powers in the box! Complete, see photo with some shelf wear at the corners. I bought it at the Mayfair booth at GenCon back in... jeez, 1993? Sadly it has seen less than a half dozen plays and has been through more apartments than that! Please provide with a good home. US shipping is $9.50
Box has general wear, but components are in great shape.
This is the Mayfair release. The components were punched, but the game was never played. Comes from a smoke-free home.
game is unpunched and unplayed. box has a bit of shelfwear. i accept payment via paypal only. shipping costs are added after purchase. feel free to message for a shipping estimate.
SOLD to joezg for collection at Essen 19th October
Mayfair edition. Contents in excellent condition. Box has a little shelf wear. This includes the expansion More Cosmic Encounter, also in excellent condition.
Mayfair edition with More Cosmic. Three races missing, but I have replaced with scans.

Punched, but never played. Components in excellent condition. Box with cosmetic dents, warp and wear.
----------- J/G
Buyer pays shipping. I ship via USPS (Priority Mail for domestic, First Class for international), and only charge what they charge me. Contact me if paying by other than PayPal.
First Mayfair Edition 1991 Mayfair. Played but Contents in very good Condition. Box has some wear at the edges.

Mayfair Edition. Unplayed and unpunched. Components all present and in excellent condition. Box has whiting and bottom box has major dishing with a gash in bottom. There is an orange price tag, upper right top of top box - looks like it may be an original price marking.

Part of my Cosmic Encounter collection, see also More Cosmic Encounter and Simply Cosmic for the complete early Mayfair editions. (If you are a Cosmic collector I have the Eon version, all nine expansions plus extras!)
Auction Sale

Game is great shape, box has some shelf wear but no cracks or splits. This is the 1991 Mayair edition. Also included is a copy of Encounter magazine, Vol. 2, issue #1. Shipping will be $14.00, US only please (I am also selling a very good condition copy of More Cosmic Encounter, by Mayfair. If you buy it too I will combine both and shipping costs will be $16.00 together)
